comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Misspelled. Ernestine Schumann-Heink, née Rössler, (15 June 1861 – 17 November 1936) was a celebrated Austrian, later American, operatic contralto, noted for the size, beauty, tonal richness, flexibility and wide range of her voice.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Shown here on the deck of a passenger liner arriving (or departing) in New York harbor.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for locating the spelling error.  We'll make that correction to the caption the next time we update the record.
